Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, north of the Khelleva Estate.
Room.LongDescription: The large Khelleva Estate lies to the south of here, surrounded by a white, picket fence, and constantly guarded by ferocious watch dogs. On the north side of the road is the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, a smaller version of the Oceancrest Central Arena, speciallizing more on individual, one-on-one type battles. Contestants may enter the Facility through the Challenger's Ready Room to the west.
